2263.text:
ANDREW KNEEBONE: We're still
partway through our journey.

2266.text:
We're enabling our
customers to order from us,

2269.text:
from a can all the way up
to a 10-ton roll of paper,

2272.text:
online, 24/7, so we're in
the middle of that roll.

2274.text:
The next thing for us at
BSG-- there's many things,

2278.text:
but the next thing for me is
we've just reserved 300,000 IP

2282.text:
addresses, and we're going to
hook up every single monitoring

2285.text:
device to every single part
of our organization to monitor

2289.text:
So then we will have an
insight into all the parts

2292.text:
of our manufacturing facility
and logistics trucks,

2294.text:
and essentially have
a nervous system

2297.text:
to enable us to give insights
back to our customers--

2299.text:
the people that make the cans,
the boxes, the PET, recycling--

2303.text:
so they know what's
going on within a second.

2305.text:
And that's the big
moonshot for us.

2308.text:
Well, with that,
thank you, gentlemen.

2311.text:
So I want to thank
all of you as well

2313.text:
for coming along and investing
your time today with us,

2316.text:
and I hope that you can take
away just-- at least you'll

2318.text:
remember our mantra around
being smart, modern, and secure.

2323.text:
Just the only follow-up I ask of
you is that you'll hear from us

2325.text:
and give us a bit
of feedback and let

2327.text:
us know what you
took out of today

2328.text:
and how we could make
it even better for you

2330.text:
when we're next down
here doing an event.

2332.text:
So with that, thank
you everybody.
